import React, { Component } from 'react' class Login extends Component { constructor(){ super() this.state = { name : "", pass : "" } this.submit = this.submit.bind(this); } stateUser={ name:"", pass : "" } submit =()=>console.log(this.state) render(){ return (

Login

this.setState({name : e.target.value})} value={this.state.name}/>
this.setState({pass:e.target.value})} value={this.state.pass}/>
Forgot password?
) } } export default Login
